input: Write a haiku about artificial intelligence.
Describe a sunset on Mars in three sentences.
Create a catchy tagline for an eco-friendly water bottle.
Write a short story opening about a time traveler's mistake.
Describe the taste of coffee to someone who has never tried it.
Write a limerick about a programmer debugging code.
Create a product description for invisible socks.
Write dialogue between a robot and a houseplant.
Describe happiness using only metaphors related to weather.
Write an elevator pitch for a restaurant on the moon.
Create a children's book title about a brave potato.
Describe the smell of rain using synesthesia.
Write a fortune cookie message for an entrepreneur.
Create a band name and album title for a jazz-metal fusion group.
Write a two-sentence horror story about smart home devices.
Describe loneliness from the perspective of a lighthouse.
Create a slogan for a company that sells bottled silence.
Write a poem about procrastination in exactly 20 words.
Describe the color blue to someone who was born blind.
Write an obituary for the last typewriter on Earth.
